quotes.quote: When we rebuild a house, we are rebuilding a home. When we recover from disaster, we are rebuilding lives and livelihoods.
Rebuilding relationship requires a lifelong discipline and commitment.
Rebuilding our communities where the police and citizens all see themselves as being on the same side will require contributions from all of us.
If we wish to rebuild our cities, we must first rebuild our neighborhoods.
We've got to rebuild human hearts - and persuade people that hope isn't just possible, but essential.
As I rebuild my life, I remind myself not to relive the past.
It is not difficult to rebuild a life. All we need is to be aware that we have the same strength we had before, and to use it in our favor.
We must rebuild organic communities, where people can come together and have analogue conversations and share stories, art, music and emotions.
You can reconstruct the picture from chaos and memory's ruins.
We can so reconstruct society that it will be self-perpetuating instead of as now, self-exhaustive.
We all reconstruct our past because we wish to see how our present came to be our present - do we not?
He tried to reconstruct the story in his mind, but it kept getting confused, bleeding into itself like watercolors.
Every time he tried to reconstruct the internal arguments that had led to his decision, they sounded feebler to him.
We renovate the heart by, of course, changing it, but we can't do that, really, without changing the other essential parts of the human personality.
Only in the shattering can the rebuilding occur.

Rebuild your world, rebuild your race, rebuild your empire. Rebuild it all. But make sure you rebuild your ideals too. Rebuild the principles that made you a great and honorable galactic power in the first place. Don't prey on the weak. Don't steal from the helpless. Don't murder the innocent. Be a force for good, not a force for yourself.
Busy remaking the world, man forgot to remake himself.
The hope of remaking the world is indispensable in the struggle of oppressed men and women.
In restoring man from evil sovereignty, we must cheat.
Only by restoring the broken connections can we be healed. Connection is health.
The problem of restoring to the world original and eternal beauty is solved by redemption of the soul.
It is the neglect of timely repair that makes rebuilding necessary.
The key to truly rebuilding our central city on a vital and sustainable foundation is people.
Without rebuilding the confidence between parties, you will never succeed.
Whenever they rebuild an old building, they must first of all destroy the old one.
We can actually reconstruct our past by examining what we think, say, feel, expect, believe, and do in an intimate relationship now.
We must start... rebuilding our cities around energy efficiency and human needs, rather than around the car and wasted energy.
We are always remaking history. Our memory is always an interpretive reconstruction of the past, so is perspective.
Remaking the world wasn't always a stage show and a cheering crowd. Politics was just warfare by other means. The losers didn't get to hold rallies.
In remaking the world in the likeness of a steam-heated, air-conditioned metropolis of apartment buildings we have violated one of our essential attributes-our kinship with nature.
